[Click here to purchase tickets!](https://rstats.ai/tickets/?utm_source=rstatsai)  
In-person & virtual tickets are available.

**Workshops:** Wednesday, June 8, 2022  
**Conference:** Thursday, June 9 & Friday, June 10, 2022  

Join in on the fun for the eighth annual New York R Conference, where R enthusiasts and data scientists will gather to explore, share, and inspire ideas!  

For more information about the speakers, workshops, agenda and more visit [rstats.ai](https://rstats.ai/nyr).  

Follow [@rstatsai](https://twitter.com/rstatsai/?utm_source=rstatsai), [@LanderAnalytics](https://twitter.com/LanderAnalytics/?utm_source=rstatsai) and [#rstatsnyc](https://twitter.com/hashtag/rstatsnyc/?utm_source=rstatsai) on Twitter for conference updates.

The R Conference is presented by Lander Analytics.
